  <script id="newscorpau-vars">
   var newscorpau = newscorpau || {};
newscorpau.site = "adelaidenow";
newscorpau.device = "desktop";
newscorpau.pagetype = "homepage";
newscorpau.environment = "prod";


newscorpau.subscribeUrl = "https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/subscribe/news/1/?int_medium=display&int_source=site-link&int_campaign=acq_onsite_login&int_content=link&sourceCode=";
newscorpau.sourceCodeMap = "AA";
newscorpau.coralcomments = {};
newscorpau.coralcomments.url = "https://mhr.talk.news.com.au/static/embed.js";
newscorpau.coralcomments.talk = "https://mhr.talk.news.com.au";

  </script>
  <script>
   const isiPad = (navigator.platform === 'MacIntel' && navigator.maxTouchPoints > 1);
if (isiPad) {
    document.querySelector('html').setAttribute('data-device-type', 'ipad');

    //- Changing call to a relative link because beta URLs are causing problems.
    let siteURL = '';
    //let siteURL = `https://www.${newscorpau.site}${newscorpau.environment === 'prod' ? '' : newscorpau.environment}.com.au`;
    //- if (newscorpau.environment === 'local') {
    //-     siteURL = `http://${newscorpau.site}.local`;
    //- }

    fetch(`${siteURL}/spp-api/v1/template/?path=layouts.whitelabel.mobile-nav&render=phug`)
    .then(response => {
        return response.text();
    })
    .then(text => {
        let navCSS = document.createElement('link');
        navCSS.setAttribute('rel', 'stylesheet');
        navCSS.setAttribute('href', `${siteURL}/wp-content/themes/newscorpau-news-dna/dist/stylesheets/css-mobile-nav.css`);
        document.head.appendChild(navCSS);
        let nav = document.createElement('div');
        nav.innerHTML = text;
        document.body.appendChild(nav);
    })
    .then(() => {
        let hamburger = `<div class="hamburger"><div class="icon-sprite-item" style="width: 16px; height: 16px"><svg><use xlink:href="#hamburger"></use></svg></div><div class="icon-sprite-item" style="width: 16px; height: 16px"><svg><use xlink:href="#cross"></use></svg></div></div>`;
        document.querySelector('nav.navigation').innerHTML += hamburger;
        let backdrop = document.createElement('div');
        backdrop.classList.add('backdrop');
        document.body.appendChild(backdrop);
        let navJS = document.createElement('script');
        navJS.setAttribute('src', `${siteURL}/wp-content/themes/newscorpau-news-dna/dist/javascripts/js-navigation-mobile.js`);
        document.head.appendChild(navJS);
    });

}
  </script>

  <script type="text/javascript">
   window.utag_data = window.utag_data || {};
    window.utag_data.newskey = "4616fd273625206258b2543f621ad74d";
    (function(){
        var qs = location.search;
        var pn = location.pathname;
        qs=qs.replace(/\?nk=[^&]*&/,'?');
        qs=qs.replace(/&nk=[^&]*&/g,'&');
        qs=qs.replace(/&nk=.*$/,'');
        qs=qs.replace(/\?nk=.*$/,'');
        if (qs != location.search || pn != location.pathname) {
            // Modern browsers, don't refresh, just get rid of the affecting parameters
            if (window.history && history.replaceState) {
                history.replaceState({}, '', location.href.replace(location.pathname, pn).replace(location.search, qs));
            }
        }
    })();
  </script>

       <path d="M14.543 12.398a.326.326 0 00-.332.326v.823l-.715-.405a.33.33 0 00-.45.118.32.32 0 00.119.444l.715.405-.689.392a.32.32 0 00-.119.444c.066.104.172.17.292.17a.31.31 0 00.159-.04l1.02-.587 1.801 1.019-1.775 1.005-1.06-.6a.33.33 0 00-.45.117.32.32 0 00.12.444l.728.405-.729.405a.32.32 0 00-.12.444c.067.105.173.17.292.17.053 0 .12-.013.16-.04l.715-.404v.797c0 .183.145.326.33.326a.326.326 0 00.332-.326v-1.163l1.802-1.019v2.012l-1.06.6a.32.32 0 00-.12.445.35.35 0 00.292.17c.053 0 .12-.013.16-.04l.728-.404v.822c0 .183.145.327.33.327a.326.326 0 00.332-.327v-.81l.702.392c.053.027.106.04.16.04a.32.32 0 00.29-.17.32.32 0 00-.119-.444l-1.033-.588v-2.038l1.762 1.006v1.202c0 .183.146.326.331.326a.326.326 0 00.331-.326v-.823l.729.405a.358.358 0 00.159.039.32.32 0 00.291-.17.32.32 0 00-.119-.444l-.715-.405.702-.392a.32.32 0 00.12-.444.33.33 0 00-.451-.118l-1.034.588-1.801-1.019 1.775-1.005 1.06.6c.053.027.106.04.159.04a.32.32 0 00.291-.17.32.32 0 00-.12-.444l-.728-.405.729-.405a.32.32 0 00.12-.444.33.33 0 00-.451-.118l-.716.405v-.797a.326.326 0 00-.33-.326.326.326 0 00-.332.326V13.9l-1.802 1.019v-2.012l1.06-.6a.32.32 0 00.12-.445.33.33 0 00-.451-.117l-.729.404v-.822a.326.326 0 00-.33-.327.326.326 0 00-.332.327v.81l-.702-.392a.33.33 0 00-.45.117.32.32 0 00.119.444l1.033.588v2.05l-1.775-1.018v-1.202a.334.334 0 00-.331-.326z" fill="#1691DB">
       </path>
      </g>
     </symbol>
    </defs>
   </svg>
  </div>
  <div class="pixel-track">
   <div class="pixel-track_sticky-leader-ad">
   </div>
  </div>

       <div class="metro-tops_group-1" data-defcon-count="3" data-nca-collection-id="4106245b943bf87a6aa34574fce7f61e">
        <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="97d2d7ac3279cbdec275c23532239f42" data-nca-asset-type="story" data-storyblock-imagesize="block_huge_image" data-storyblock-layout="stacked">
         <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="homepage-defcon" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="1" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/sport/local-sport/live-streams/exclusive-live-stream-of-sa-junior-country-basketball-championships-starts-830am-sunday/news-story/97d2d7ac3279cbdec275c23532239f42">
          <div class="responsive-img" data-desiredimagesize="block_huge_image" style="padding-bottom:56.25%">

           </a>
          </h4>
          <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-1" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="2" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/truecrimeaustralia/police-courts-south-australia/tobacco-smuggler-xi-wang-jailed-for-more-than-two-years-for-illegally-importing-tens-of-thousands-of-cigarettes/news-story/ea1d8a952fda4dcb7b978b059bfb8c75">

           </div>
          </a>
          <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">

          <h4 class="storyblock_title">
           <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-1" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="4" data-word-match="" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/news/south-australia/sexual-consent-lessons-more-important-than-babies-and-body-image-according-to-sa-teens/news-story/9e8839b612072ba4ae945dc1c52a0a57">
            How kids want outdated sex ed fixed
           </a>
          </h4>
          <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-1" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="4" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/news/south-australia/sexual-consent-lessons-more-important-than-babies-and-body-image-according-to-sa-teens/news-story/9e8839b612072ba4ae945dc1c52a0a57">

            <img alt="Former Kambala student Chanel Contos who started an anonymous online petition to improve sex and consent education in schools across Australia.            </div>
          </a>
          <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
           Sex education needs to shift its focus from babies and body image, according to SA teens.
          </p>

         <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="c01464595042df9ca8dc817bec927c1f" data-nca-asset-type="story" data-storyblock-imagesize="thumbnail" data-storyblock-layout="thumb-image-right">
          <span class="storyblock_meta">
           <span class="storyblock_meta">
            <span class="storyblock_label g_font-base-s video">
             Video
            </span>
            <a class="storyblock_section g_font-base-s" href="/truecrimeaustralia/police-courts-south-australia">

            </a>
           </span>
           <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-21T09:26:00+10:30">
            30 minutes ago
           </time>
          </span>
          <h4 class="storyblock_title">
           <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-1" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="5" data-word-match="" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/truecrimeaustralia/police-courts-south-australia/car-bursts-into-flames-after-hooning-at-salisbury-north-and-motorcyclist-battling-life-threatening-injuries-in-bad-weekend-on-sa-roads/news-story/c01464595042df9ca8dc817bec927c1f">
            Shocking moment car crashes, bursts into flames
           </a>
          </h4>
          <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-1" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="5" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/truecrimeaustralia/police-courts-south-australia/car-bursts-into-flames-after-hooning-at-salisbury-north-and-motorcyclist-battling-life-threatening-injuries-in-bad-weekend-on-sa-roads/news-story/c01464595042df9ca8dc817bec927c1f">
           <div class="responsive-img" data-desiredimagesize="thumbnail" style="padding-bottom:75%">
            <img alt="A hoon driver has been arrested and his passenger is in hospital following a crash overnight at Salisbury North.
Just before 2.30am on Sunday 21 March, patrols and emergency services were called to Uraidla Avenue, after a Holden sedan crashed into the fence of a school and caught fire. PIcture: 7NEWS" class="responsive-img_img storyblock_img" height="75" sizes="150px" src="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/68a82f89d3095cebce2b7cd400669c41" srcset="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/68a82f89d3095cebce2b7cd400669c41?width=150 150w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/68a82f89d3095cebce2b7cd400669c41?width=320 320w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/68a82f89d3095cebce2b7cd400669c41?width=650 650w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/68a82f89d3095cebce2b7cd400669c41?width=1024 1024w" width="100"/>
           </div>
          </a>
          <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
           A hoon driver has been charged after his car crashed into a school fence and burst into flames  while a motorcyclist has also crashed overnight.
          </p>
          <div class="storyblock_footer">

        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="tops-3" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="4" data-word-match="" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/news/opinion/matthew-abraham-its-sad-to-see-beautiful-and-colourful-celebrations-sanitised-to-a-whiter-shade-of-pale/news-story/243eee3e08148b9bb59cc322ae25af9b">
          Footy beats God in the city of churches
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         Tens of thousands will be let into Adelaide Oval on Good Friday but virus rules will make Easter a more humble affair in SAs churches, writes Matthew Abraham.
        </p>
        <div class="storyblock_footer">
         <div class="storyblock_comments">
          <div class="icon-sprite-item" style="width: 16px; height: 16px">

         </a>
        </h4>
        <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="coronavirus" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="1" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/coronavirus/covid-updates-in-australia-vaccine-rollout-delays-as-nz-travel-bubble-resumes-with-qld/news-story/d0e23cc94c1957c19b559c191a6958b6">

         </div>

       </article>

        <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="local" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="3" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/messenger/north-northeast/playford-council-closes-stebonheath-dog-park-for-a-week-after-infected-dog-visited-with-kennel-cough/news-story/82facd2472b2b2ed198614f1a3d5b67a">
         <div class="responsive-img" data-desiredimagesize="block_wide_image" style="padding-bottom:56.25%">
          <img alt="Stebonheath Dog Park will be closed until March 26." class="responsive-img_img storyblock_img lazyload" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/312f6e5a5431b5e7f7408c83c294ffab" data-srcset="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/312f6e5a5431b5e7f7408c83c294ffab?width=150 150w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/312f6e5a5431b5e7f7408c83c294ffab?width=320 320w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/312f6e5a5431b5e7f7408c83c294ffab?width=650 650w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/312f6e5a5431b5e7f7408c83c294ffab?width=1024 1024w" height="720" width="1280"/>

        <span class="storyblock_meta">

         <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-19T16:18:00+10:30">

        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="local" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="3" data-word-match="" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/messenger/north-northeast/playford-council-closes-stebonheath-dog-park-for-a-week-after-infected-dog-visited-with-kennel-cough/news-story/82facd2472b2b2ed198614f1a3d5b67a">
          Kennel cough outbreak shuts down northern dog park
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         A northern suburbs dog park has been closed for a week after a local canine unknowingly visited it while infected with the potentially deadly kennel cough.
        </p>

      <div class="m3-3m_list">
       <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="85eed8e2f3e2181e7eafee5f7de45547" data-nca-asset-type="promo" data-storyblock-imagesize="block_square_image" data-storyblock-layout="fastnews">
        <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="premium-promos-2" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="ev" data-tgev-order="1" href="http://bit.ly/littlelegends2021">
         <div class="responsive-img" data-desiredimagesize="block_square_image" style="padding-bottom:100%">
          <img alt="" class="responsive-img_img storyblock_img lazyload" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/cc651551153eb6d43c88e7f486eeda8e" data-srcset="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/cc651551153eb6d43c88e7f486eeda8e?width=150 150w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/cc651551153eb6d43c88e7f486eeda8e?width=320 320w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/cc651551153eb6d43c88e7f486eeda8e?width=650 650w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/cc651551153eb6d43c88e7f486eeda8e?width=1024 1024w" height="768" width="768"/>
         </div>
        </a>
        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="premium-promos-2" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="ev" data-tgev-order="1" data-word-match="" href="http://bit.ly/littlelegends2021">
          Nominate a little sporting legend!
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         Nominate a little legend from your sports club or school. They could win $100!
        </p>
       </article>
       <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="43fde085773d2bc4da80e7276b4e2a4d" data-nca-asset-type="promo" data-storyblock-imagesize="block_square_image" data-storyblock-layout="fastnews">

         </div>
        </a>
        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="premium-promos-2" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="ev" data-tgev-order="2" data-word-match="" href="https://www.heraldsun.com.au/news/property/peter-maddisons-21-grandest-australian-design-homes/news-story/1ff6228f2ffd7907c05a3cdb29b52bfd">

     <div class="mosaic m3-3s" data-nca-collection-id="0e812c39db1c2362040284765af57559" data-nca-edit-widget="newscorpau_capi_sync_collection-28">
      <div class="mosaic-heading mosaic_title m3-3s">
       <h3 class="g_font-title-xs">
        <a data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="business" data-tgev-label="header-business" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="0" href="/business">
         Business
        </a>
       </h3>
       <div class="mosaic-heading_meta mosaic-heading_meta_c3po">
        <div class="c3po-button-placeholder g_font-base-s" data-facetid="/business" data-followedfromdomain="adelaidenow.com.au" data-layout="follow" data-name="Business" data-type="route">
         <button class="btn" data-facetid="/business" data-followedfromdomain="adelaidenow.com.au" data-layout="follow" data-name="Business" data-type="route">
          Follow
         </button>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="m3-3s_list">
       <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="4e8ed3d4cdd5a8c23091c8b96e0d9c84" data-nca-asset-type="story" data-storyblock-imagesize="thumbnail" data-storyblock-layout="thumb-image-right">
        <span class="storyblock_meta">
         <span class="storyblock_meta">
          <a class="storyblock_section g_font-base-s" href="/business">
           Business
          </a>
         </span>
         <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-19T09:39:00+10:30">
         </time>
        </span>
        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="business" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="1" data-word-match="" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/business/a-company-with-a-onceproud-manufacturing-history-has-closed-its-doors/news-story/4e8ed3d4cdd5a8c23091c8b96e0d9c84">
          171 year old South Australian business shuts up shop
         </a>
        </h4>
        <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="business" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="1" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/business/a-company-with-a-onceproud-manufacturing-history-has-closed-its-doors/news-story/4e8ed3d4cdd5a8c23091c8b96e0d9c84">
         <div class="responsive-img" data-desiredimagesize="thumbnail" style="padding-bottom:75%">
          <img alt="A multi storey apartment block and hotel is proposed for the site of the former EG Wigg and Son factory at 79 Port Rd, Thebarton. Pic: Tricia Watkinson" class="responsive-img_img storyblock_img lazyload" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/60e7d4f3ce6bd8e0564539bbd4bb4c2f" data-srcset="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/60e7d4f3ce6bd8e0564539bbd4bb4c2f?width=150 150w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/60e7d4f3ce6bd8e0564539bbd4bb4c2f?width=320 320w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/60e7d4f3ce6bd8e0564539bbd4bb4c2f?width=650 650w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/60e7d4f3ce6bd8e0564539bbd4bb4c2f?width=1024 1024w" height="75" width="100"/>
         </div>
        </a>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         A company which was founded in Adelaide more than 150 years ago has closed its doors its main manufacturing business was sold more than five years ago.
        </p>
        <div class="storyblock_footer">
         <div class="storyblock_comments">
          <div class="icon-sprite-item" style="width: 16px; height: 16px">
           <svg>
            <use xlink:href="#comment">
            </use>
           </svg>
          </div>
          <span class="storyblock_comment-count_count g_font-base-s" data-comment-count-post-id="4e8ed3d4cdd5a8c23091c8b96e0d9c84">
           0
          </span>
         </div>
         <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-19T09:39:00+10:30">
         </time>
        </div>
       </article>
       <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="3184d730258d3c59466b1b37983cb72b" data-nca-asset-type="story" data-storyblock-imagesize="thumbnail" data-storyblock-layout="thumb-image-right">
        <span class="storyblock_meta">
         <span class="storyblock_meta">
          <a class="storyblock_section g_font-base-s" href="/business">
           Business
          </a>
         </span>
         <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-19T11:38:00+10:30">
         </time>
        </span>
        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="business" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="2" data-word-match="" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/business/adelaide-oval-overcomes-horror-year-hit-by-covid19/news-story/3184d730258d3c59466b1b37983cb72b">
          Oval overcomes battle for financial survival
         </a>
        </h4>
        <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="business" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="2" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/business/adelaide-oval-overcomes-horror-year-hit-by-covid19/news-story/3184d730258d3c59466b1b37983cb72b">
         <div class="responsive-img" data-desiredimagesize="thumbnail" style="padding-bottom:75%">
          <img alt="AFL - SHOWDOWN 48 - Port Adelaide v Adelaide Crows at the Adelaide Oval. Fans socially distancing in the southern stand Picture SARAH REED" class="responsive-img_img storyblock_img lazyload" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/a46fbef70fcb8b067424e0db32dc00d1" data-srcset="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/a46fbef70fcb8b067424e0db32dc00d1?width=150 150w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/a46fbef70fcb8b067424e0db32dc00d1?width=320 320w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/a46fbef70fcb8b067424e0db32dc00d1?width=650 650w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/a46fbef70fcb8b067424e0db32dc00d1?width=1024 1024w" height="75" width="100"/>
         </div>
        </a>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         The operator of Adelaide Oval is bouncing back from a horror year that saw it slip millions of dollars into the red in a battle for its financial survival.
        </p>
        <div class="storyblock_footer">
         <div class="storyblock_comments">
          <div class="icon-sprite-item" style="width: 16px; height: 16px">

        </div>
       </article>
       <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="51da28313367592828c4279033e00f77" data-nca-asset-type="story" data-storyblock-imagesize="thumbnail" data-storyblock-layout="thumb-image-right">
        <span class="storyblock_meta">
         <span class="storyblock_meta">
          <a class="storyblock_section g_font-base-s" href="/business">
           Business
          </a>
         </span>
         <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-19T13:31:00+10:30">
         </time>
        </span>
        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="business" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="3" data-word-match="" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/business/greensills-australian-arm-hit-with-55bn-in-creditor-claims/news-story/51da28313367592828c4279033e00f77">
          Greensill on brink of liquidation
         </a>
        </h4>
        <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="business" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="3" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/business/greensills-australian-arm-hit-with-55bn-in-creditor-claims/news-story/51da28313367592828c4279033e00f77">
         <div class="responsive-img" data-desiredimagesize="thumbnail" style="padding-bottom:75%">
          <img alt="Lex Greensill.jpg" class="responsive-img_img storyblock_img lazyload" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/9b66b90717dfce8700f97a5260e1c796" data-srcset="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/9b66b90717dfce8700f97a5260e1c796?width=150 150w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/9b66b90717dfce8700f97a5260e1c796?width=320 320w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/9b66b90717dfce8700f97a5260e1c796?width=650 650w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/9b66b90717dfce8700f97a5260e1c796?width=1024 1024w" height="75" width="100"/>
         </div>
        </a>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         The first creditors meeting of collapsed global financier Greensill Capital has revealed a $4.8bn claim from two main creditors.
        </p>

        <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="entertainment" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="1" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/entertainment/arts/adelaide-fringe-defies-the-covid-odds-to-deliver-successful-event/news-story/b04c1c0cd18858a87afcedae3ba6cf11">
         <div class="responsive-img" data-desiredimagesize="block_wide_image" style="padding-bottom:56.25%">

         </div>
        </a>
        <span class="storyblock_meta">
         <span class="storyblock_meta">
          <a class="storyblock_section g_font-base-s" href="/entertainment/arts">
           Arts
          </a>
         </span>
         <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-21T00:00:00+10:30">
         </time>
        </span>
        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="entertainment" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="1" data-word-match="" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/entertainment/arts/adelaide-fringe-defies-the-covid-odds-to-deliver-successful-event/news-story/b04c1c0cd18858a87afcedae3ba6cf11">
          Adelaide Fringe defies all odds
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         With a mostly South Australian program and reduced venue capacities, the Adelaide Fringe has still delivered a box office hit.
        </p>
        <div class="storyblock_footer">
         <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-21T00:00:00+10:30">
         </time>
        </div>
       </article>
       <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="1a89e626c758f98382b227710cdc10a5" data-nca-asset-type="story" data-storyblock-imagesize="block_wide_image" data-storyblock-layout="stacked">

        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="entertainment" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="2" data-word-match="" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/entertainment/celebrity/why-did-meghan-and-harry-spend-57-million-on-a-wedding-that-wasnt-for-them/news-story/1a89e626c758f98382b227710cdc10a5">
          $57 million Harry shouldnt have taken
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         It was gifted to him and Meghan from Prince Charles and taxpayers for their big day  but now the Sussexes are saying the wedding wasnt for them.
        </p>

     <div class="mosaic m5-lm3s" data-nca-collection-id="8a8e9afabad06df45d79cd7e47acf14f" data-nca-edit-widget="newscorpau_capi_sync_collection-21">
      <div class="mosaic-heading mosaic_title m5-lm3s">
       <h3 class="g_font-title-xs">
        <a data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="sport-1" data-tgev-label="header-sport" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="0" href="/sport">
         Sport
        </a>
       </h3>

        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="sport-1" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="1" data-word-match="" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/sport/womens-sport/inside-the-dedicated-push-for-more-women-athletes-to-be-recognised-in-bronze/news-story/b6505c32922bcceffa556c29ede78ecc">
          Monumental sexism: Where are all the female statues?
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         These are the numbers that reveal a shocking imbalance in how our great female athletes are recognised throughout Australia.
        </p>

        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="sport-1" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="2" data-word-match="" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/sport/motor-sport/v8-supercars/supercars-sandown-500-2021-live-results-shane-van-gisbergen-defies-belief/news-story/b3364b9f06f0db18523acbf8a14c0422">
          SVG defies belief in Sandown deluge
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         Just two weeks after surgery on a broken collarbone, Shane van Gisbergen has backed up from his incredible win in the opening race at Sandown to claim pole.

          </a>
         </span>
         <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-20T18:35:00+10:30">
         </time>
        </span>
        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="sport-2" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="1" data-word-match="" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/sport/afl/teams/port-adelaide/port-adelaide-afl-news-miles-bergman-in-the-mix-for-round-1-debut-against-north-melbourne/news-story/f220496cc011b5157c5bb9c11e4b831f">
          Rockliff to start season as Port sub
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         Former Brisbane captain Tom Rockliff will start as the medical sub in Round 1 after missing out on a spot in Port Adelaides best 22. See all the teams news.
        </p>

       <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="2ea32207945eec13990dfe1315e5da82" data-nca-asset-type="story" data-storyblock-imagesize="block_wide_image" data-storyblock-layout="stacked">
        <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="sport-2" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="2" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/sport/motor-sport/formula-one/formula-one-stars-should-have-been-lighting-up-the-track-at-albert-park-on-sunday-but-instead-race-organisers-are-in-planning-for-a-november-event-here-is-the-latest/news-story/2ea32207945eec13990dfe1315e5da82">
         <div class="responsive-img" data-desiredimagesize="block_wide_image" style="padding-bottom:56.25%">
          <img alt="BAHRAIN, BAHRAIN - MARCH 12: Lando Norris of Great Britain and McLaren F1 and Daniel Ricciardo of Australia and McLaren F1 stand on the grid during Day One of F1 Testing at Bahrain International Circuit on March 12, 2021 in Bahrain, Bahrain.         <span class="storyblock_meta">
         <span class="storyblock_meta">
          <a class="storyblock_section g_font-base-s" href="/sport/motor-sport/formula-one">
           F1
          </a>
         </span>
         <time class="storyblock_datetime g_font-base-s" datetime="2021-03-21T06:33:00+10:30">

        <h4 class="storyblock_title">
         <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="sport-2" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="2" data-word-match="" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/sport/motor-sport/formula-one/formula-one-stars-should-have-been-lighting-up-the-track-at-albert-park-on-sunday-but-instead-race-organisers-are-in-planning-for-a-november-event-here-is-the-latest/news-story/2ea32207945eec13990dfe1315e5da82">
          Revealed: How F1 will return to Melbourne
         </a>
        </h4>
        <p class="storyblock_standfirst g_font-body-s">
         As the Albert Park track lays silent for the second straight year, more details have been given about how Daniel Ricciardo and co will return later this year.
        </p>

              <h4 class="storyblock_title">
               <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="afl" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="2" data-word-match="" href="https://www.adelaidenow.com.au/sport/afl/adelaide-v-geelong-patrick-dangerfield-sweating-on-match-review-after-high-bump/news-story/ca235fe52869c4d5e1deaed822eaa598">

               </a>
              </h4>
             </article>

              <a data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="escape" data-tgev-label="header-escape" data-tgev-metric="npv" data-tgev-order="0" href="http://escape.com.au">

             <article class="storyblock" data-article-id="e6cb9b1326bd76b339ec66a71143dd02" data-nca-asset-type="promo" data-storyblock-imagesize="block_mid_image" data-storyblock-layout="list">
              <a class="storyblock_image_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="escape" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="ev" data-tgev-order="1" href="https://www.escape.com.au/top-lists/7-reasons-the-world-is-seriously-pissed-with-australia-right-now/image-gallery/cbbe447ce570042842fcd27741924acb">
               <div class="responsive-img" data-desiredimagesize="block_mid_image" style="padding-bottom:75%">
                <img alt="Crowd of people in Bondi beach on a Sunday." class="responsive-img_img storyblock_img lazyload" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/4a2f54bb25781e5b73cf00f60a5994d7" data-srcset="https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/4a2f54bb25781e5b73cf00f60a5994d7?width=150 150w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/4a2f54bb25781e5b73cf00f60a5994d7?width=320 320w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/4a2f54bb25781e5b73cf00f60a5994d7?width=650 650w, https://content.api.news/v3/images/bin/4a2f54bb25781e5b73cf00f60a5994d7?width=1024 1024w" height="768" width="1024"/>
               </div>
              </a>
              <h4 class="storyblock_title">
               <a class="storyblock_title_link" data-tgev="event10" data-tgev-container="escape" data-tgev-label="story" data-tgev-metric="ev" data-tgev-order="1" data-word-match="" href="https://www.escape.com.au/top-lists/7-reasons-the-world-is-seriously-pissed-with-australia-right-now/image-gallery/cbbe447ce570042842fcd27741924acb">
